author: Mike Moraitis
title: Chip Kelly reveals who was most responsible for Raiders drafting Dont'e Thornton
description: The Las Vegas Raiders might have landed themselves a gem in 2025 fourth-round pick and wide receiver Dont'e Thornton. Raiders offensive coordinator Chip Kelly recently revealed who was most responsible for the pick.
